mapper.select: select count(*) from reply where del_ny='N' and rep_ny='N' and table_no = 10 and mem_no = #{memNo}
select count(*) from reply where del_ny='N' and rep_ny='N' and table_no in (2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9) and mem_no = #{memNo}

select r.reply_no, r.reply_content, to_char(r.enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "enroll_date", r.group_board_no from reply r join member m on r.mem_no = m.mem_no where r.del_ny='N' and r.rep_ny='N' and r.mem_no = #{memNo} and r.table_no = 10 order by r.reply_no desc

select r.reply_no, r.reply_content, to_char(r.enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "enroll_date" from reply r join member m on r.mem_no = m.mem_no where r.del_ny='N' and r.rep_ny='N' and r.mem_no = #{memNo} and r.table_no in (2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9) order by r.reply_no desc
